name: Connie Smith
text: Sometimes you tend to be nervous when it comes to getting taxes done. Though, my experience started rocky, due to my place of my appointment, no one was there. But once I made a phone call, Eric P, a representative in another office, told me to stop by. He made the process easy going, comfortable and and worth the extra drive. I definitely will recommend Jackson Hewitt to others for tax services.

resp.text: Connie, your 5-star review Of Eric P's professional tax services brightens our day. We love hearing he made the process so easy and comfortable after your experience started off a little rocky. Please ask your family and friends about Eric's great tax services, and we look forward to seeing you next tax season. Sonja, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Carlos Lopez
text: I just want to say that out of all the years I have filing taxes and all the places I have tried, Jackson Hewitt was the best, but the reason was because of Mrs. Hope. Hope was amazing I recommend everyone to go to her she will make your filing less stress.

-Danielle, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Donald palazzolo
text: Always friendly, knowledgeable staff. Wait time was very fast. I have used this location for the past 3 years and it will be the only place I'll go to have my taxes prepared. They will get you the most back on your refund and offer several loan options if your interested in one. For the price they charge you can't beat what all you get . Best of all is peace of mind knowing that they have my back if anything unforseen comes up. Thank you for your great service.

resp.text: Hello DJ, thank you for allowing us to assist you with all your tax needs over the past 3 years. We are delighted that we get to see you each year and will ensure you get your maximum refund! We look forward to seeing you again for many years to come. -Rebecca, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: My experience was amazing. Eric P. Was very nice and knowledgeable! I've used Jackson hewitt for years and he's one the best I've ever had help me with my taxes. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Hi Jinx!

Thank you so much for the wonderful review regarding your five star experience with Eric and how knowledgeable and nice he is!  We are so grateful that you always come back to see us!  We look forward to seeing you again soon, and hope you will share your great experience with family and friends!

-Danielle, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Chris Colburn
text: The agent was uninformative and hard to understand when she spoke. She also entered my email address incorrectly which resulted in me not receiving the $100 Wal-Mart. She called another person who is supposed to send me the gift card but it's been 2 weeks now and still haven't gotten it. I have emailed the agent multiple times requesting the gift card but have not gotten the card or even a response. I'm very disappointed and now questioning the competence of these agents! Also, the fee was very excessive considering it was a simple return. The agent could not or would not give me a price until the return was completed which seems odd.

resp.text:
Thank you for your honest feedback, Chris, though I'm sorry to hear you've had issues receiving your promotional gift card, and that you found our fees to be unreasonable. Our services come reinforced by a Maximum Refund guarantee along with our Lifetime Accuracy Guarantee and IRS Audit Assistance, because Jackson Hewitt has you covered if the need arises. We would like to help you resolve your gift card issue, and ask that you please give us a call at 800-234-1040. We hope to hear from you, and appreciate the opportunity to be of service.

Jeanie
Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: David Fadule
text: Our tax lady this time was Tammy Edwards at Walmart in alabaster. Fortunately for us, the guy that was supposed to do the taxes there at that time decided to take the day off. I have to admit that Tammy was professional and took care of business like it was nobody's Business. She was respectful, professional, and knowledgeable. I will most definitely in the future go back to her for my tax needs. If I find anybody that need their taxes done I will most definitely recommend her.

resp.text: Hi, David ! Thanks for leaving   Tammy  a review for the service you received! If you have any friends or family that need tax prep, please have them come in. We would love that! Make sure they ask for your tax pro and  mention you referred them. That way, we can make sure they get the attention they deserve.We look forward to providing you  recommendable   service in the future!-Kianna, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Skye Stop
text: I have been filing for 5 years and the last two years they wouldn't give me a cash advance why I made 6 grand.plus they didn't give the second stimulus check until 45 day after everyone else

resp.text:
Thank you for sharing your honest feedback, though I'm sorry to hear of your disappointment regarding the refund advance amount decision made by our underwriter Metabank. It's never our intent to let you down, and though we're not privy to the reasons for their decision, you will have a letter from them with more details within 30 days of your visit. MetaBank considers criteria such as identity verification, IRS repayment history, current status of child support, student loans, tax liens, etc. in factoring their decision, as well as the estimated size of your anticipated tax refund.

Though this explanation may not resolve your frustration, I hope it helps to shed light on the process. If there are any additional concerns you'd like to discuss, please give us a call at 800-234-1040, as we want to ensure any issues are addressed with the attention deserved, and if needed, escalated to the appropriate team to best be of service. We appreciate the review, and look forward to your call if we can further assist. - Jen, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: AWFULL!!!! Went to get our taxes done earlier this year. I meant to write this review earlier. The lady that helped us didn't know her BUTT FROM A HOLE IN A GROUND or she didn't want to mess with us due to other circumstances..JUST SAYING. She didn't want to itemize our taxes said that it wouldn't help or matter. Got mad when we asked her to pull up my husbands files from the prior years on his schooling. All in all she wanted to do a short form only get back $250.00. federal but yet pay state $275.00. I went home and itemized, using TURBO Tax. Got back nearly $1000.00 from federal and $150.00 from state. I'm sorry just because you did the business from your home and couldn't anymore and went to H & R block. You need to quit!!!!!!! I don't think she liked our type. But anyway it is what it is.

name: Kelly Ratcliff
text: My fiance and I decided to use this office for his taxes for the 2017 year because we thought they might be able to find him more tax breaks.  Well, they did however, we were definitely scammed!  After seeing that they wanted to charge over $500 for preparing his taxes, the ladies then quickly said they could take off $200 of that price.  We weren't happy with it but since they had already inputed everything we said ok.  So he signed everything and we THOUGHT everything was fine and dandy.  We didn't bother to look at the paperwork when leaving because the women assured us that they had given him a discount.  Well, I go to pick up his check and BOOM...they still charged the OUTRAGEOUS fee!  What the heck?????  After calling and questioning both the manager (who was there that day) and the owner, they still refused because he signed the paperwork...even though they told us it wouldn't be that price.  Guess what folks?! SCAMMERS!  Go get your taxes done SOMEWHERE ELSE!  DO NOT FALL FOR THIS PLACE!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hello Kelly, oh no! Please have your fiance give us a call at 800-234-1040 as this is never what we want to hear. We would like to look into this further for him.

name: storm hall
text: The only reason I gave them one star is beacuse you have to leave one to leave a Review. They deserve nothing, I went to fill my taxes for the first time as a independent contractor not only did they not tell me I didn't make the threshold to even have to file. They filed my paper work anyway and charged it as the most important form and then took half of my money. 800 they took 400 its important beacuse when I went back to do an amended return that they told me they would do for free. I remember because they had to call corporate and ask what to do. They decided when I went back to charge me a full 175 for something they told me was free. I got upset and left days later when I was forced to retrieve the rest of the amended money I was promised beacuse of other circumstances I gave into my pride and filed not only am I still waiting on my money since January which is unfair. THEY ALSO amended almost a whole 2,000 back from me so yeah I was supposed to have around 2,800 the first time. NOT WORTH IT ALL OF THEM!!. And then when they mess up apparently it's free????? But I was STILL CHARGED lol but I used a prepaid card so that's my small win

resp.text:
Hello Storm,
Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback, though I'm sorry to hear that you found our fees too high. JH tax services come reinforced by a Maximum Refund guarantee along with our Lifetime Accuracy Guarantee & IRS Audit Assistance, because Jackson Hewitt has you covered if ever the need arises. Fees may also differ by location and filing situation, your local JH can best provide a breakdown of charges and the benefits included with this season's filing. We never want to disappoint our clients. If there is anything we can do to rectify your experience, please contact our client care dept. at 1-800-234-1040, and we will do our best to resolve any issues. - Stephanie, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: After trying to file my taxes on my own and failing I decided to set up an appointment with someone who knew what they were doing. I set an appointment online with Jackson Hewitt. She’s professional, nice, and pretty funny. Taxes were done in 30min! I recommend this location and also seeing Dominique for you tax assistance!

name: Mitchell Gibson
text: It's sadThat I have to call other Jackson Hewitt'sBecause this Jackson Hewitt claims they're always busy  my fiancee  filed her taxes Feb 8this and got hers back before me and I filed  Jan 15 and still ain't seen  anything,   so I'm trying to call and get information about my refund and I have to call other Jackson Hewitt's in order to get an answer,  and I know it depends on the government and meta bank, but when he signed me up for my advancement loan he made sure that go pushed, threw,  now when I'm trying to get answer and results they refuse to answer that phone...and dew  to that fact I'm going through all this bull, I will no longer file for Jackson hewitt,  I gave u guys well enough more credit and now all of a sudden I can't even here from my branch,

resp.text:
Hello Mitchell,
Thank you for the feedback. I am so sorry for all the frustration. Please call 1-800-234-1040 and select option 0. When you speak with client care agent let them know you have not received a call back from the office and want to have a Ticket created. The Ticket will ensure that all appropriate management is notified and will create a tracking system to follow up until the issue has been addressed. I hope that helps. - Stephanie, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: randomly1981
text: I've had H&R Block Opelika, AL process my income taxes for the states of Alabama and Georgia since 2006.  Mrs. Rita Sanders has been the person to always prepare my tax papers.  I have been very satisfied with Mrs. Sanders dedication, commitment and professionalism.  I intend to continue using Mrs. Sanders services for as long as I can.

name: Mary Velasquez
text: Clem was gem! Originally, I tried to do my taxes myself online, and it said I owed over $1,200. Clem was able to figure it out in a timely manner, and I didn't owe any money in the end. Thank you!

name: Leia Brown
text: I have used H&R Block to prepare my taxes for the past three years and for the last two years have had Mr. Clem Chappell as my preparer. He has continually impressed me with his knowledge and thoroughness, but even more so with how much he actually cares about helping me maximize my refund. As a single working mother, every penny counts, and to have confidence that the person who is carrying out this important task is not only knowledgeable but sincerely cares about helping you is priceless. Besides the peace of mind of knowing I’m in good hands, Mr. Chappell has a very calming presence and as a result of these factors, I have come to enjoy what has historically been a stressful and burdensome task for me. Its a little moment of quiet and peace, and I get money at the end of it. Total win.

name: Belinda Butler
text: I live 30min away from Opelika so I made an appt 6 days in advance & I arrived early the day of the appt. Mr. Chappell had a customer before me who was LATE causing me to have to wait for over ONE HOUR before being seen. This delay caused me to miss another appointment in town that I had made that same day. There were agents who had NO customers yet I was not allowed to use one of those agents because I had made an appt with Mr. Chappell. THAT IS NOT FAIR. I guess they work on commission but it's not fair to us rule abiding customers who are having to wait. The LATE client should have been made to wait in the waiting area during my appt time since I HAD made my appt 6 days prior & WAS ON TIME. Then that client could have finished their appt after me. HRB's good/mindful customers who pay a lot of money to get our taxes done by HRB agents are the ones getting penalized and treated like our time isn't important!  I do not know that I will return to HRB next year because of this!

name: Olivia Writes
text:
I am so glad I came to this location. My husband and I came in with some pretty complex tax problems having moved here from England a few years ago. And while their front desk person was not a tax person, she knew so much and helped us do a drop off and gave us a list of other documents and items we would need. Then she double checked with a tax person and she was dead on right! Wow, even the front desk person was as sharp as a tack!

We believe her name was Otia, she always has a great big smile on her face, and is so sweet and patient too. She listened to what we had to say, and asked us back to make sure she had it right. We went to another location which we wont give details on, but they made us feel like we weren't important to them.

So we drove to Madison. We remembered the front desk lady we met. And boy were we glad to see her face, just a smilin and glowing all the time. Otia made us feel right at home despite our normal snobby demeanor coming from the ranks we have. But with Otia, I don;t think it would have mattered what our income was - she's nice to everyone from what we can tell- we didn't want to leave - she's funny too, laugh Out loud.

Otia is why we came and we will tell all our friends for this tax season, where to go. She mentioned that we can also get book keeping services.

Thanks Otia, we left you a note to thank you.

May God Bless and keep smilin!

name: Iceeu (Sonshine)
text:
I had to give a star to review Mr. Parker. My. Parker is the Accountant for my neighborhood's H.O.A. I was relatively new to the neighborhood just buying my home 2 years prior to investigating the H.O.A. I was unable to get any financial information from the only board member so I went to Mr.Parker.
His Secertary was so kind and very helpful and I appreciated that. She told me Mr. Parker was not in the office after returning from an office. I asked her some questions and she went back and forth to the same office with answers to the question's. I them saw a man comes from the office leaving and got on the elevator headed down. I know this today to be Mr.Parker, as she walked past the man was wearing a T-SHIRT advertising his business Bryan L. Parker Accounting. I later sent him emails requesting his presence at our Association meeting, I never received a reply.
I realize that all of this blame doesn't lie solely at Mr.Parkers feet, it lies equally at his feet and that of our Association President's feet. I received contradictory answers for questions I asked. As a homeowner I and my neighbors pay a fee to Mr. Parker and as an employee he should have been able to answer everyone of my questions and he did not. It is my opinion and the opinion of many of my neighbors that Mr. Parker made no effort to assist us with any information at all at several different requests and times. To us that is shady behavior.

resp.text: This post appears to have some misunderstandings. First of all, whoever was seen walking past, if you were told I was not in the office, was not me. We do not have t-shirts advertising our business so I would question if you were even at our office, since you have inaccurate information. Secondly, we are not employees of the HOA, we are contracted by the HOA board to handle certain accounting functions and provide the board with requested reports. Similar to any business, the reports are disseminated from the top (HOA) to those who need to know. Privacy laws are very strict and we try to adhere to them diligently. If you want more access to information of your HOA, I suggest you become a member of the board. As I understand it, several requests have been made for more board participation but thus far there have been no takers. If you become a board member, we would be glad to share appropriate information with you.

name: Alisha Turner
text: My husband filed taxes with Ms. Tyson, whom told him we'd have to come back and sign papers together (totally fine). When we went back she didn't have any forms or note on our file and she wasn't there so they couldn't help us. We had to pack up our newborn and 1 year old and come back all over again when she was working. When I came back in she had me sign for my husband, so if I can sign for him why he couldn't sign for me and skip all this extra inconvenience is beyond me. She also said they'd have to mail in our Alabama taxes and she "didn't know why it did that but if we don't receive our refund in 2-3 weeks call the IRS"... Nothing about this experience was positive except the woman at the front desk was friendly on all occassions and apologized on behalf of Tyson the first time I came in, which Tyson herself never apologized for whatsoever.

text: I have relied on The Faircloth Group for approximately 7 years for both business and personal and highly recommend their service. Thank you Nathan and your amazing staff for all your hard work and the extra time you take with your clients.

text: The Faircloth Group has been amazing to work with. As a newer company we were lost when it came to preparing our taxes and doing our bookkeeping. We started off by trying to do things ourselves and realized that we were unable to keep up with that aspect. When we contacted The Faircloth Group they were very friendly and helped us to understand the process. They were able to go back and catch our books up for the entire year and we set up an ongoing agreement to keep everything up to date, taking those tasks off our plates. It was such a relief to find such a great team to handle our bookkeeping, business and personal taxes.

resp.text: Thank you, Carlie, for your positive feedback! We're passionate about helping local business owners navigate and understand the accounting process. We're fortunate to work with great business owners like you! Your success is our success:)

name: Brian Brown
text:
Until this year i have not had any issues with Jackson Hewitt on Jordan Lane. My tax documents were brought to them on time yet my taxes have not been filed because they say I must sign a release giving them permission to share my information with their third party affiliates for marketing purposes. Is requiring me to submit to robo calls and unwanted emails just to file my taxes against the law?
Update. After all is said and done guess what? I didn't have to sign away my right to being contacted for marketing purposes by third party affiliates just to file my taxes. Jackson Hewitt just wants you to believe that you have too. My taxes have been filed, late but filed.
Read what your signing folks or companies like Jackson Hewitt will slip in unnecessary documents for their financial gain

resp.text:
Hello Brian

Thank you for choosing Jackson Hewitt!  We enjoy working with you and understand your concerns about third parties.  Due to Federal Regulations we need your signature to file your taxes with the IRS and to utilize a third party financial institution to ensure you receive your refund as fast as possible.  Further as a valued customer we will provide you with dates of our popular Refund Advance and Office openings for the tax season.

You are more than welcome to opt out of the notifications, however we cannot file taxes without a signed agreement for us to share your info with a third party AKA the IRS.

I hope this helps clear things up for you.  Please feel free to call us with any other questions you have at 800-234-1040

Best regards,
Sara
Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Misti Nicole Atlanta (MISTI NICOLE ATLANTA)
text: We were referred to Mark William Rogers by another salon professional. We made an appointment. We commuted 2 1/2 hours to have him do our taxes.  From over the phone and all the way through the entire process, he was so calm and professional. Great at explaining everything! I am a small salon owner and now live out of state. He has continued to work with us via fax and email to ensure we get the attention and help we need. He makes sure you are accessing all your deductions. He was well trained and very current on all the rules and regulations. Last year he was slammed as we called way too late, he referred us to Cynthia. She was great! All in all, I highly recommend them. They have literally taken all the stress and anxiety out of our tax season. PLUS----all the knowledge we gained, helped us to be better prepared year after year. Customer since 2014

name: Whitney Jackson
text: I’ve been using Thompson Tax Jackson Hewitt for the past 7 years or so and even though I work out-of-town throughout the year, I’ve continued using them until now! I was audited in 2015 but was relieved when I remembered Thompson tax had an audit guarantee.  I called the office and they told me to submit whatever the IRS was asking for in the letter and to call them back if I received anymore letters or coorespondates . Fast-forward 6 months, 25 letters & 2 warnings, I never received any help from Thompson tax; I sent numerous emails and phone calls but no one in the office was really trying to solve my issue or take accountability in resolving my audit. I was recently in town for a weekend and dropped by the office. The secretary that was in that day said she had no clue about a audit guarantee or what I was even talking about. I ended up talking to one of the tax guys and he informed me it would probably just be best if I paid the almost 5 figure amount they were requesting. Thanks for nothing Thompson Tax, you’ve lost a faithful customer!I’ve been using Thompson Tax Jackson Hewitt for the past 7 years or so and even though I work out-of-town throughout the year, I’ve continued using them until now! I was audited in 2015 but was relieved when I remembered Thompson tax had an audit guarantee.  I called the office and they told me to submit whatever the IRS was asking for in the letter and to call them back if I received anymore letters or correspondents . Fast-forward 6 months, 25 letters & 2 warnings, I never received any help from Thompson tax; I sent numerous emails and phone calls but no one in the office was really trying to solve my issue or take accountability in resolving my audit. I was recently in town for a weekend and dropped by the office. The secretary that was in that day said she had no clue about a audit guarantee or what I was even talking about. I ended up talking to one of the tax guys and he informed me it would probably just be best if I paid the almost 5 figure amount they were requesting. Thanks for nothing Thompson Tax, you’ve lost a faithful customer!

resp.text: Hello Whitney, oh no that is never what we want to hear. We have your back for all your tax needs.  Please contact us at 800-234-1040 so that we can assist you with your concern.

Be using them again for any other tax needs.

name: Stephanie Borman
text:
Neola made filing taxes so easy! Had such an amazing attitude so kind and friendly.  Answered every question we had, and then some!
Everyone at this location are very professional and helpful. Thank you Jackson Hewitt. Will definitely return again next year!

name: Amanda Herring
text: My experiences here in this tax office have been the BEST I’ve ever had! Neola was my friendly tax preparer. She was gracious, efficient, pleasant, informative, and kind to myself and my father (retired Chief Master Sgt US Air Force)- I received my max ecumenical possible and my fee was incredibly reasonable and affordable, also everything was easily explained. Neola will now, I hope forever be within my reach for any financial and tax needs- Jackson Hewitt is incredibly fortunate to have her on their team! Thank you for all your help-

name: Miss Sherry
text: Really enjoyed my experience with jackson Hewitt. The lady who prepared my taxes was nice and thorough. The only downside was a error on my part because I thought all my bank information was there when we were preparing,  but I forgot that I was working with a new tax service and not my old one n forgot my info. Luckily they offered me a card to put my refund on n it came earlier than I expected. Will have ALL my information next time when I have to file next year when I prepare and I thank JH for their promptness and excellent service. Will definitely reccomend if someone asks where's a good tax service to get you taxes done!

name: James Biits
text:
I am active duty stationed at Gunter.  Usually I get my taxes done at the base but this year a lot of base services are closed.  Every time I called the legal office all I get is we hope it will be open in February.   I couldn’t wait that due to getting surgery soon so I noticed that a Jackson Hewitt was opening at Dalraida Commons. I always go there to shop at Publix and after looking  at some reviews for H&R Block that are not great I figured I would give this office a shot.
I was very surprised at how nice the store was and how fast my taxes were done.   Although I was the first active duty member that Destiny took care of she was still thorough and asked a lot of questions.  Even the manager was very helpful and gave me 50 percent off my tax preparation!!  Attention Maxwell and Gunter don’t bother with the base just save the time by seeing Destiny and the staff at this location.  You will be well take care of

name: Matt Mathis
text: It was my first year filing as married and the staff was very patient and helped me very much. They answered all my questions and explained everything to me through the process. Very easy to recommend them to anyone looking for help with their taxes.

text: I have filed my taxes for the passed few years with them. I have even sent a few people to them. The passed few years I was expecting money for my state and never got them the lady told me they sent the state out and never did last year. I talked to them they said I was supposed to do that I told them that I never got paperwork to send to the state and they told me they will find all my state for the past few years and give them to me. I called and noone either answer or always gave me the run around and I still not got my state paperwork yet. The state owes me.

name: Temika Washington
text: These people will rob you without a gun. My refund amount was $8,464.13 and when I received my check from them I received 5,634.21. I did get a refund advance for $1500 but I still don't understand what other fees were for. The girl who filed my taxes entered my employer identification number in wrong and I had to file an amended return plus I had to get a tax advocate. After over 4 months of waiting due to the girl who did my refund mistake I received what was left of my refund after they robbed me.But one thing will I will NEVER do is go back to Money Tax. They charge ridiculous fees and they are very unprofessional.

name: Aretha Jackson

name: Tracie Smith
text: If I could write a review without giving a star I definitely would because they don't deserve a star at all.The first reason is the amount I was charged for a simple return is highway robbery. Another reason is the fact that the young man as nice as he was, wasn't quite trained enough to be actually dealing with live customers. He got up and walked away to ask  a a coworker (boss or supervisor I am guessing) questions on what he needed to do or not do or if this was correct etc he got up and asked questions 4 different times before his superior finally took over and finished the process using his tax number still giving him the credit for doing the return. Finally the condescending tone in which the superior who finished up the process for the young man that I started spoke to me about sometimes it could be a long process or the process of doing it could take a while yes I understand that sometimes having your taxes done can be time-consuming but not with such a simple return. It wouldn't have been such a long process if the young man had have been better trained in what he was doing. It wasn't his fault and he was sweet as he could be he just wasn't ready, and no one explained anything to me about the fees or anything like that. It was truly a horrible experience.

resp.text: Tracie - Thank you for the valuable feedback. Our goal is to make your tax life easier, and we apologize you didn’t have a positive experience. We’d like the opportunity to work with you and make it right. If you could call us at 1-800-472-5625, our support team is ready to help.

name: Hope Moon
text:
Will not ever go back to file with them. I filed my taxes in February and haven't heard anything back. I went
to the location in Attalla AL to find out that they are closed. I also found out that they took my state return for their fees without letting me know first.

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback, Hope, though I apologize if there was any miscommunication regarding how the costs for this year's filing services would be deducted. It is our policy to deduct the costs of tax prep from whichever return (federal or state) is received first when the costs are deducted from your refund vs paid for up front at time of service. Regarding your anticipated refund, the quickest and most accurate source for updates on your federal refund status will continue to be the IRS 'Where's My Refund' tool available here: https://www.irs.gov/refunds

If it's been over 21 days since the IRS has accepted your return, and their 'Where's My Refund' tool doesn't reflect an updated status, we recommend reaching out to them directly for the most accurate update on your refund. They are available 7am-7pm EST Monday - Friday at 800-829-1040, though please note that hold times appear to be shorter for those calling earlier rather than later in the day. I hope the information helps to clarify on the time frame for processing, though please give us a call at 800-234-1040 if we can address any additional questions or concerns, we value the opportunity to be of service. - Jen, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

resp.text: Hi Anthony!  I apologize for your experience with our office and tax pro. We never want our clients to leave disappointed. Please contact us at 1-800-234-1040, so we can address your concerns. We'd love the opportunity to rectify the situation to your satisfaction. - April, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

resp.text:
Hi Chely, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. There have been a number of delays from the IRS when processing returns this tax season, the best place to check the status of your refund is the Where's My Refund tool on the IRS website, found here: www.irs.gov/refunds. Please continue to check their website regularly for additional updates and information. I hope that you receive your return very soon!

Jeanie
Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Cathy Solis
text:
Need a Notarization? This is the place!
TWO Alabama State Notary Public Officials are available at this location.
Mobile Notary Service is an added plus. They will travel to nursing homes, hospitals, your place of business, etc.

WHY PAY AN ATTORNEY HUNDRED OF DOLLARS when we can print out our own LAST WILL AND TESTAMENT on our home computers & take them to be notarized???

In many cases, if you die without a valid will, you will NOT have control over what you leave behind. Instead, A PROBATE COURT GETS CONTROL OF ALL YOUR ASSETS.

Have you received your W-2 or 1099 to file for your tax return?
ACA Tax Service is here at this location 365 DAYS OF THE YEAR!
We are better off avoiding the temporary  'store front'  tax return companies who disappear a month after we've filed & have received a letter from the IRS.
The dedicated professionals at ACA back you up with the IRS by calling them when you have questions or concerns.

ACA cashes Payroll Checks, Insurance Checks, Government Checks, & Income Tax Refund Checks for your convenience.

The exemplary professionals at ACA Tax Service are conscientious, respectful individuals who make client satisfaction their first priority.

name: Brett Richardson
text: Had an appt set up for 10, got there 5 mins early. I was finally recognized by the receptionist 5 after 10, when she got off the phone. "Mr. Richard's?", I politely informed her it was "Richardson". "OK, Jacinta will be with you shortly, Mr. Richards". Again, politely informed her it was "Richardson". Jacinta came and got me, also calling me Mr. Richards. Also, informed her it was Richardson, to no avail, as she kept calling me by the wrong name. We sat down to start filing my taxes, and she asks for my W2s. I pull out a thumb drive, to her shock and horror. She then informs me there is nothing she can do for me if I don't have physical copies of my W2s. I ask her if this is stated anywhere on the website or in the information provided when you book an appt. It's not. Absolutely terrible customer service and a severe lack of communication on their part.

name: Randall Bragg
text: I had Kathy help me with my taxes. I had originally done my own taxes through turbotax, but because of the military, I had a few extra issues that I could not take care of on my own. She originally helped me to try and fix my errors on turbotax and save me the money, but sadly, the state of alabama wouldn't accept my state form. I quickly rescheduled an appointment with her, and together we got my state forms filled out quickly and ready to be sent off through the mail. She definately went out of her way to help me in many ways. Thank you!

name: Alaskan Breeze
text: Great

name: That Girl
text: I typically file my taxes myself or a friend who is a CPA files it for me. I decided to go with H&R Block this year for the option of the instant refund up to $3,000 as advertised. The instant refund i actually received though was less than I expected. The $500 loan towards my over $5,000 refund wasn't worth the fee you all charge. The bulk of my refund still won't come in til the end of February, which is the same time frame I would have received it by filing myself. I knew upfront that the IRS doesn't release refunds that include  EITC or ACTC til the end of Feb but thought by using your instant refund that I could get at least 1/4 of my refund earlier. In addition to being disappointed in the instant refund advance and the fee for filing, I was also disappointed in my CPA's knowledge and ability to use your software. Her customer service was great but she admitted several times that she wasnt great with the tech  side and had to consult with someone else at least 4 times

text: Wanda is amazing. She did my taxes last year and was very sweet. She did them this year and was equally amazing. I made an appointment for 3. When I got there the receptionist was very condescending. I told her my name and that I had an appointment. She told me that she had called me several times to confirm my appointment and left several voicemails. She confirmed my phone number and told me that since I had not confirmed they had made an appointment at that time with someone else. I had received no phone calls or voicemails. She made it seem as if it was my fault when I believe she called the wrong phone number. I went back and met with Wanda, who was again, very sweet. When we were done, the receptionist apologized and told proceeded to tell me she had called me last week to confirm the appointment. That made no sense since I had made my appointment only the day before. I appreciate the apology but was not a fan of being made to feel like I had neglected to do something.

name: Kayla Jones
text: Regina did my taxes and she was so sweet and overall very professional and awesome. She took her time and didn’t seem like she was trying to rush through it (like ive had experience with in the past). While she was doing my taxes the power happened to go out for a second. When it came back on it had saved some of it but she had to work again on them and she was very patient and professional with it. She even apologized multiple times even though it was not her fault. I highly recommend letting Regina do your taxes. This was my first time using them and as long as Regina is there I will not go anywhere else.

resp.text:

- Kianna,  Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: Jessica was the most helpful tax professional I have ever had. She walked me through the entire process to make sure I fully understood each area and that we had all possible deductions. I will return every year as long as she is my tax pro!! Thanks Jessica!!!

name: Jessica Mac Farlane
text:
Absolutely horrible! DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION! I would recommend any other tax preparer in the area but avoid Jackson Hewitt!!!! Area Manager, Kim Stewart, is extremely rude and would rather lie to you than do her job.
They advertise promotions but will not honor them unless you threaten a lawsuit.
They submitted my return incomplete without W2. They couldn't enter basic information like name and email correctly which got my refund advance denied. They post on social media the dates and time to expect refunds...more lies.

resp.text: Hello Jessica, I am very sorry to hear about the negative experience you had at the office as this is never the experience we want you to have. We would like to speak with you and get some additional details about your experience with our office staff, your tax return and the concern you have about the promotion. When it comes to the timing of the refund I do understand it can be frustrating waiting for the funds, but please know that we have to wait for the IRS to release funds and sometimes it is later than initially anticipated especially if there are any delays due to the PATH Act. Please give us a call at 800-234-1040 so that we can assist you in resolving your concerns. We hope to hear from you soon. -Rebecca, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: Troy and his team are by far the best in north Alabama. I trust nobody else to do my own taxes or answer any questions I have. Top-notch service!

name: Jane Hillis
text:
We highly recommend Key Tax Solutions for all your tax, accounting, and financial needs!  Troy helped us during a stressful time dealing with the IRS.  He gave us calm reassurance by telling us exactly what to do, how to do it, and even went above and beyond by handling some of the details himself which was not his responsibility yet he did it anyway.
Also, Troy gave us a concise checklist on what records/receipts to keep for the upcoming tax year's deductions. Such a simple item, but after never having had any kind of checklist to guide us, it's value has proven to be Huge!   The checklist alone was worth coming to Key Tax Solutions!  It has made all the difference in easing the stress of gathering up our records for this year's Tax filing!
My husband Roger and I can't say enough great things about the excellent and professional support Troy, as well as the entire office staff at Key Tax has given us!  Mark us down as Super Satisfied Clients!

name: Courtney Davis
text: Major mistakes made on my 2015 taxes resulted in an IRS audit and now I have to repay between $5-10,000. I had assumed that since we were paying a tax professional, things would be done correctly. Never assume anything. I’m told that the mistakes made should not have been made by anyone with more than a week’s tax preparation experience. There are no words to properly express how dissatisfied I am with this company.

text:
I think Carter is a good CPA and we got along really well, but there were some shortcomings on our day to day activity that could have been better.

Overall, they are a solid firm, but probably not the best fit for a contractor in the construction industry.

name: M Gazouli
text: They billed me $95 for having a 5 minute conversation with me on the phone. $160 for printing a form from they're computer. Did not disclose they're billing practices to me, getting on the defensive saying that "Time is Money" and when I complained about it they dropped me as a client the day my taxes were due leaving me less than 24 hours to file my business sales tax, then would not copy my information to take to another CPA saying the receptionist was out of the office saying she was the only person with access to my file.  They are horrible on the phone, nasty with they're business practices, and nastier if you question they're billing!  Not nice people to go with, they are they're for the money, not for your welfare, and dropping you the day your taxes are due proves that!  JUST HORRIBLE PEOPLE AND BUSINESS PRACTICES!!

name: Natalie Tuck
text: Extremely professional and affordable. I have worked with Sharon for years. She is super efficient and the communication she has with her clients is outstanding!

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words, Natalie! We understand that communication is the key to help clients not only overcome obstacles, but to understand them.

name: babin sj
text:
Profit Wise has freed me from the stress of doing my business taxes, and has allowed me to focus on the the parts of my business that I love.
Sharon and crew are very active in giving back to our community, and I'm thankful for them and the good they do!

Steve Babin, Photographer

resp.text: We care about our clients and our community. After all, they are one and the same. Thank you, Steve!

name: Lawrence Johnson
text:
I hired Profit Wise to do my business and personal account. There is still difficulty in believing the incompetence and flat-out lack of character this “firm” displayed with my accounting.

I found Ms Ashleigh Heinz to be a consistent and complete liar as far as returning phone calls and keeping due dates.

I also worked with Ms Jacqueline Harwood, who frequently would not return calls and had difficulty doing bookkeeping tasks that should have been routine.

Ms Sharon Heinz completed my tax return and said I owed over 12K in taxes. I requested a meeting to review my return with Ms Heinz. I ended up meeting with Jonathon. After going through my tax return, I ended up owing less than 2K in taxes.

Not only was I not offered an apology for the service that I received I was terminated as a client.

A first-class organization this is not. Proceed at your own risk. They will gladly collect your money beware the service.

name: Lamia Haddad`
text: This is the first year I do business with Profit Wise and for the first time I can say filing my taxes was stress free. Their employees are very welcoming (always smiling). Everyone I've dealt with was highly professional and kind. If you call when they're busy, they always call you back and address any question or concern you may have. Also when they tell you your taxes will be completed on a specific date, rest assured that they will respect you and abide by it. Jonathan was especially helpful and knowledgeable. Sharon is very professional and smart. You can tell she knows what she's doing. She's also extremely sweet and friendly which makes it a joy to do business with her. Thank you Sharon :)

resp.text: It's easy to smile when you have great clients and enjoy helping them succeed. Thanks, Lamia!

name: Thos Kite Art & Design (Thomas Kite)
text: I came to Profit wize with both my business and personal taxes because I was dissatisfied with my previous accountant. They are very professional, efficient and really helped me with my complicated tax situation. It was easy to load up docs etc to a secure share so that my personal information was never compromised. I found them to be friendly and I feel they really care about their clients. When I reviewed the returns, I was hoping I did not owe any tax but it turns out I did. So the person who worked on my taxes went back to the drawing board and found some additional credits ( I supplied him with some additional documentation). I was thrilled as he was able to get me money back on my federal return and a lower state tax bill. I feel he put in some extra effort  to make me happy. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you! We are glad you came to us for help! We look love to watch  our clients grow, personally or in business.

name: The Engineer
text:
We went to Profit Wise because we weren't very satisfied with our previous accountants. Sharon and her team were extremely professional, friendly, and talented. The process was a walk in the park!

We sat together and Sharon explained everything to us. She made sure everything made sense before we left too!

Taking care of my and family's taxes was NEVER so easy!

Go ProfitWise!

resp.text: Along with overcoming tax issues, we like to help our clients understand them. We are happy you came to us for help!

name: Randy Gatlin
text: Fantastic customer service. I was out of the country for several years and had not filed over that time. Between that and moving back and forth overseas, our tax situation was very complicated. Sharon helped us get caught back up and up to date with our tax obligations. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: No matter how complicated, we can always find a solution. Thanks, Randy!

name: S.W. Unite
text: This is the second year Profit Wise has prepared my personal tax return. Excellent service and friendly atmosphere. This firm is top notch and highly recommended.

resp.text: You're making us blush with that glowing review! Thank you!

name: Westy's Pet Grooming
text: Sharron, Ashleigh, and I have dealt with at Profit Wise have always been a pleasure to work with. I'm new to business ownership and constantly on the go. They make things simple and easy to manage. So glad I found them!

resp.text: You take care of the pets, we'll take care of the paperwork. We are thankful for the oppurtunity to help your business grow!

name: Joyce Betts
text: I appreciate the professionalism. Kindness is a quality that attack you to people they displayed that toward me. I would highly recommend this company to others. Thanks

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful review.

name: robert wentz
text: I have been working with Sharon and Ashley since 2018, and they have helped me with Business as well as personal taxes.  I have used other firms for tax and bookkeeping services, but Profit Wise provides the best services in town. They are extremely knowledgeable and just a pleasure to work with. Their staff is freindly and able to work with my busy schedule. I can not thank Profitwise Accounting enough for all they have done for me, and highly recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Mr. Wentz, Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  We enjoy working with you too.

name: James Wheeler
text: Sharon has done a wonderful job taking care of our taxes the last couple of years.  Wish we had used her earlier.

resp.text: We are glad you are here now. Thank you, James.

name: B Knox
text: I was very impressed with the professionalism of this office. I went to them to correct a tax problem/error from a previous company. They were able to go through previous returns and show us what was incorrect and they assisted us with getting our returns corrected and we also ending up getting more money back on previous returns. I would definitely use them for my future tax services.

name: Chris Day
text:
I was given Sharon's information through a friend and my dealings thus far have been phenomenal. Initially for my father, a local buisness owner, she sat down w/ us and went over all his needs and buisness concerns. After which she explained several different options he had and exactly how each one was different and/or beneficial to him. He signed on immediately and walked out of our consult an hour later relieved and I at ease knowing he was in good hands. Sharon and the Profit Wise team have been handling his payroll, taxes, etc for several months now and are extremely happy w/ the results.

After seeing how professional and meiticulous she had been, I moved my families personal taxes over to her as well and am extremely pleased.

If your thinking of hiring a new CPA, finding one for the first time, or just not sure.. I highly recommend a consultation with Sharon before making a decision.

Thank you Sharon and Profit Wise for the exceptional service

I highly recommend Bandura CPA, LLC for any business owner who needs help with their bookkeeping and tax filings.

I am disgusted as I am a 10 year United States Marine Corps veteran and I am considerably successful in all of my endeavors. You are no longer important. Figure it out!

name: funny Bryston
text: Miranda Cameron is awesome. She always go above and beyond to make sure that I have the best experience when visiting HRB. She came in early just for me and had donuts and coffee ready. Filing taxes can be a stressful thing, but she makes it so easy. All my paper work is organized when I leave and I don't have any concerns when l leave the office. I would definitely be back next year.

name: Kimberly Austin
text: Today I called into the office asking about the advance. I thought was question was simple and being that they are tax professionals they would be able to answer me. WRONG! I asked them to get an ESTIMATE for the advance would I have to file my taxes.... the guy on the phone didnt understand he kept saying make an appointment and come in. I said its saying prequalify online but I dont see the link to do so. He said oh it must be down just come in. I stopped by another tax place for their quote. I finally made it to my appointment and worked with nathan. I didnt think he understood me at first. I asked him the exact question but he gave me an answer. He said I didnt not have to submit to get the estimate(not knowing he wasnt talking about the advance estimate even though I kept saying ADVANCE ESTIMATE) so he continue through the process and boom we at the end Nathan say u ready to submit? I said wait when do I know how much the estimate is. He said I can show u he said its based off your refund not credit check. I so ok. He broke it down to what I will bring home and said based off this amount (told me my amount) the loan will be an estimated MINIMUM of $2K which was more than the other place. I said so When will i know exactly how much the advance will be do i have to submit it first? He said yes. After submitting everything im sitting there looking dumb waiting for something to pop up and he say OK YOU WILL FIND OUT IN 24 hours. No biggie.... i got my forms and went to the car. BEFORE i made it to my car i got 2 test messages ONE saying my taxes was submitted and one was the approval for the advance however it was for $500. Tried to call them they was closed. Spoke to someone else they was going to call me back... my advice is to not trust someone who will lie over simple questions they will have your bank info, your social, address and all. I DO NOT recommend them to my worst enemy! Top it off i paid over $500 to file! You lost me as a customer!
